remarks: Closure property of a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsscl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lsscl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
lsscl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lsscl.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lsscl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsscl $p |- ( ( U e. S /\ ( Z e. B /\ X e. U /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( ( Z .x. X ) .+ Y ) e. U ) $.
